Blog:
I apologize for my rude tone while talking to our client during yesterday’s video call. Upon further reflection, I recognize that I not only presented myself unprofessionally but also disrupted the meeting’s productivity by creating tension. I see that I’ve put the team and the company in a difficult situation. 
I’ve privately reached out to my team members who were present to personally apologize for putting them in an uncomfortable spot. I’m committed to doing better in high-pressure situations and learning conflict-resolution strategies to help me communicate according to our company standards.
 I sincerely apologize for my mistake and will, of course, accept the consequences of my actions.
